Summary: Intense light beam observed and mental image of woman screaming
divs: Sighting DetailsTwo observers were sitting on a house back porch after dark. One observer was male, the other female. The male observer suddenly heard a woman screaming. when he asked the woman sitting next to him if she heard it, her answer was no. At that time, an intense perfectly triangular beam of light white in color was observed shining on the trees at the back of the lot. The tree line is dense, and located about 100ft from the back of the house. The light slowly moved about the trees for a period of 5 minutes, and then went out. No other observations were made at this time.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Randleman
There were no other sightings in Randleman on or around November 7th 2007
